originalText.text: I'm in love with my UniUkiyo bag!! I got it a couple of years ago, and I wear it so often, in my casual and also my dressed up days. I love its high quality, soft leather, and the handmade style. People ask me often where did I get this authentic bag, and I always highly recommend buying it for yourself or getting as a unique gift to your loved ones‚ù§Ô∏èüíØ

originalText.text:
On all my travels, national and international, personal and professional, UniUkiyo bag is my the most important companion. It is a powerful statement. It adds value to every single occasion and event, either casual or highly professional.
You may carry everything that you need and more and it will still look elegant (not heavy or bulky). You can go around all day long for all kind of adventures and you will not even know that you carry a bag, it fits as a glove on your back. I am stoped in the middle of Manhattan and complimented. I was approached in the small European villages and asked about this extraordinary looking item. It is definitely a "must to own" piece of accessorie that I would recommend everyone to have. And the greatest joy is that UniUkiyo bag is the most unique present that you can give to your special person and also highly memorable gratitude gift to your valuable business clients and partners.

originalText.text: So I got this back quite a time ago and since than it is always with me. First think I need to say - the quality is AMAZING. The leather, seams, finishing, everything is made very well. My bag is MinnieU , and for my height it suits perfectly. I also like the option that you can wear this back many different ways.

originalText.text:
I just love it!
Genius design, great leather, handmade üëå
I have 1 big and 3 small ones and I wear them non stop. I also loved the fact that there are many colors to choose, so now I have them fitting all my cloths.
Aaaand, they attract the spotlight in the room/street üòÅ
Also, it's a very good deal - price is not high at all for what you get.
